p: Next, we analyzed the role of Usp18 during intramuscular immunization, as often applied during vaccination. As expected, the presence of Usp18 improved the neutralizing Ab response in WT mice compared to CD169-Cre +/ ki x Usp18 fl/fl mice ( Figure 2E,F). Together, these data show that during the local administration of VSV, Usp18 in CD169 + macrophages is one important factor modulating the antiviral immune response.
